name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Hanafuda II
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

"HANAFUDA II" includes standard Japanese table card games of "Koikoi", "Hanaawase/Hachihachi", "Oichokabu" etc. Enjoy playing these addictive Japanese card games HANAFUDA!

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
